title: Ruunan's Hurricane (bug or range?)
body:
I was playing with new possible builds and this item came into play. At the time, I was tinkering around with TF, but I noticed if I was at my max range the effect wouldn't proc. I noticed this mostly when I was dealing with the super minions.

Anyone else see this problem with other champs?

replies.body:
Yeah, that's what I thought..

So it's a bug, because a lot of times it wouldn't hit additional targets unless i moved closer or additional targets moved closer towards me. Think like Jayce or Urgot range.
The extra bolts form ruunans have the same range as your AAs, so if there are no other targets in range it wont proc
